meanings.definition: A person or thing that wheezes.
meanings.sent1: The old man with a cold was one of the wheezers in the waiting room.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed an inhaler to help the wheezers breathe better.
meanings.sent3: The little dog with a funny snore sounded like a wheezers in disguise.
meanings.sent4: The broken fan in the attic was a wheezers, struggling to push out air.
meanings.sent5: The haunted house was filled with the eerie sound of wheezers in the dark.
